text:
Tutorial - How do we solve a system of linear equations using any method

\begin{array}{l}\n\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{2}{3} y=\frac{5}{6} \\\n\frac{5}{12} x+\frac{7}{12} y=\frac{3}{4}\n\end{array}[imath]\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{2}{3} y=\frac{5}{6} [/imath] [imath]\frac{5}{12} x+\frac{7}{12} y=\frac{3}{4}[/imath]
